docs.title: Documentation Demo
docs.text: This demonstrates a docs-as-code workflow with automated builds and web-based editing.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Markdown-based content
  • Web-based editing interface
  • Automated website generation
  • PDF export capability

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Edit content through the admin interface at /admin/
  2. Changes trigger automatic rebuilds
  3. View results at the published site

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text:
The system combines:

  • MkDocs for static site generation
  • Decap CMS for web-based editing
  • GitHub Actions for automation
  • LaTeX for PDF generation

docs.title: Code Example
docs.text:
def build_docs():
    """Generate documentation from Markdown."""
    return "Documentation built successfully"

docs.title: Table
docs.text:
Output Format Status Website HTML ✅ PDF LaTeX ✅

This demonstrates professional documentation workflow capabilities.
